title: Seriously GET RID of Autofill!!!!
body:
Please click the 'up' arrow if you agree, the autofill sucks!! It is wrecking ranked games and making bronze even more troll! 

People would rather wait/have a long queue time than this stupid autofill idea, whats the point in playing ranked if you get forced into a lane you can't play/dont like/dont do well in

replies.body:
You can check out the data on that here; http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/rethinking-ranked-fives-and-tuning-dynamic-queue

Low elo (basically Bronze-low Plat) have a near 0% chance to get autofilled, and about 10% at Master+. It's not actually hurting your Ranked experience at all, and they have also improved matchmaking to give higher priority to your primary role so you get that more often even when playing an in-demand one so the opposite of what you feel you're experience is happening. If you think your team doesn't know their roles, it's not because they were forced into a position they don't know, it's because they are Bronze and they aren't that great in any role.

Just focus on what you can do to improve yourself and you'll climb. If you spend too much time worrying about everyone else you won't improve.

hmmm funny... 

lol survived since its birth with people ending up with positions they didn't want to play, then just this year they implement a system that makes it much more likely to get what you want even if there is a very very slight possibility that you get a position you don't want, and suddenly everyone complains.
